text: kaha usane, jisake paas pustak ka gyaan thaah main le aaoonga use, aapake paas isase pahale ki aapakee palak jhapake aur jab dekha usane use, apane paas rakha hua, to kahaah ye mere paalanahaar ka anugrah hai, taaki meree pareeksha le ki main krtagyata dikhaata hoon ya krtaghnata aur jo krtagy hota hai, vah apane laabh ke lie hota hai tatha jo krtaghn ho, to nishchay mera paalanahaar nisprh, mahaan hai
